channel.title: Node on 我的Hugo静态站
channel.description: Recent content in Node on 我的Hugo静态站

item.title: sublime text3 配置nodejs build 环境
item.description: 可参考使用Sublime Text 3 进行Python3开发 Tools–>Build System–>New Build System 写入 { "shell_cmd": "/usr/local/bin/node ${file}", "selector": "source.javascript", "file_regex": "^(...*?):([0-9]*):?([0-9]*)", "working_dir": "${file_path}", } 保存为/Packages/User/node.sublime-build 然后选择环境为node即可
